actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $40,000 to $60,000 the maximum amount of mortgage protection life insurance which the Veterans' Administration may provide veterans with service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Increases the maximum amount of veterans' mortgage protection life insurance from $40,000 to $60,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $40,000 to $60,000 the maximum amount of mortgage protection life insurance which the Veterans' Administration may provide veterans with service-connected disabilities.
